content.raw:
It's not critical especially considering other concerns at the moment, but things like interpreting which integer refers to which foot should really be done via enum.

For example:

```
#!c++

     atlasSimInterfaceStateMsg->foot_pos_est[0]
```

should really be


```
#!c++

     atlasSimInterfaceStateMsg->foot_pos_est[Atlas::FOOT_LEFT]
```

Which requires the relevant headers which are currently not included.
